articles.title: Rio Ferdinand offers sympathy to Harry Maguire after bomb threat - Daily Mail
articles.description: Having endured a tough week on the pitch and violent threats off it, Ralf Rangnick chose to take his captain out of the firing line for the Saturday lunchtime trip to top four-chasing Arsenal.
articles.content:

articles.title: Rafa Benitez says Everton promised him 'massive project' but he only had £2m to spend - Daily Mail
